title: Extraordinary resonant transmission in two-terminal fermionic transport
authors: P. S. Muraev, D. N. Maksimov, A. R. Kolovsky
abstract:
We analyze conductance of a two-leg ladder connected with fermionic
reservoirs, focusing on the decoherence effect induced by the reservoirs. In
the absence of decoherence the system exhibits both bound states in the
continuum and Fano resonances. We found that the Fano resonances in
transmittance are robust against decoherence, at the same time decoherence
prevents collapse of resonances induced by bound states in the continuum.
